items.sentence: Tom drove all the way across town just to buy a birthday cake for Mary.
I wish Tom would understand that when I want his help I\'ll ask for it.
Tom didn\'t have as much trouble falling asleep as he thought he would.
I suppose you want to ask me why I didn\'t go to your party last night.
We don\'t know where Tom is, but we need to find him as soon as we can.
